dc.title: DSIRE: Database of Energy Efficiency, Renewable Energy Solar Incentives, Rebates, Programs, Policy
dc.description: The Database of State Incentives for Renewable Energy (DSIRE) is a comprehensive source of information on state, local, utility, and selected federal incentives that promote renewable energy.
dc.subject: Incentives Renewable Energy IREC NC Solar Center Renewables Portfolio Standards tax incentives federal
